name: Dead Space
notes: At the end of the GOG installer you may get: "Runtime Error" - You can just press OK and ignore this.
content:
files:
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
- setup: N/A:Select gog Windows setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Dead Space/Dead Space.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- task:
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
